Watch the video, tells you all.

Since there is no forums, I'm going to have to ask here: I got the revolver, but after using up my 5 shots I have no idea how to get more bullets. I completed the rest of the game (including taking down the boss with a lucky jump) without it, but I'm still wondering how da heck do you get more?

Edited June 5, 2013 by The Destroyer
Maybe I didn't post it at the right time? Or are people just not interested?

I'm interested! I've played through a bit so far, it's pretty damn good.

There's a bunch of custom levels already available here: http://forums.pcgamingwiki.com/viewforum.php?f=50

Also make sure to check out the Gunpoint Wiki: http://gunpointwiki.net/
I have yet to buy it but it looks good.
